health_tips.detail: Excess Salt intake can lead to high blood pressure which is linked to conditions like hear failure and heart attack, kidney problems, stroke
Many research has proved that sugar increases diabetes risk both directly and directly, its important to avoid added sugar especially from sugar-sweetened beverages
Eating too much saturated fats in your diet and can raise bad LDL cholesterol in your blood which can increase the risk of heart disease and stroke
Smoking causes heard disease,cancer,stroke,lung disease and COPD. It also increases risk of tuberclosis,certain eye diseases and problems of the immune system

health_tips.topic: Drink a glass of Water first thing in the morning
health_tips.detail: Drinking water improves the creation of new blood cells and muscle cells and helps in loosing weight
exercising helps you maintain a health body and wait and reduce fats in the body

health_tips.topic: Beware of your skin care product
health_tips.detail: Avoid toxic skin care products which contains harmful chemicals that endangers your skin
Getting enough sleep lowers your risk of serious health problems, reduce stress and improve your mood. Endeavour to get atleast eight(8) hours of sleep daily
Fruits contain vitamins and minerals that help that hep protect an energize the body. Normalize fruits like pawpaw,strawberries,pineapple,apple,watermelon,orange
Vegetables are the source of many nutrients and minerals,Having a variety of vegetable intakes strenghtens your immune system and helps fight against diseases and infections
